DependencyItem.Message: This version of DVDArt_Plugin requires MediaPortal 1.6.0 Beta or higher!
DependencyItem.Name: MediaPortal

GeneralInfo.Name: DVDArt_Plugin
GeneralInfo.Author: m3rcury
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: This plugin scans your MovingPictures, MyFilms, MyVideos, TVSeries and Music databases and downloads DVD Art, Clear Art, Clear Logo, CD Art, Banners, Actor, Writer and Director images from the fanart.tv and themoviedb.org websites where applicable.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription: Reduced logo size of manually created DVD Art.
GeneralInfo.Tags: dvdart, cover art, clear art, clear logo, scraper, movingpictures, tvseries, music, actors, writers, directors, myfilms

SectionParam.Name: Online Icon
SectionParam.Description: The icon file of the package stored online (jpg,png,bmp)

SectionParam.Name: Configuration file
SectionParam.Description: The file used to configure the extension. If have .exe extension the will be executed If have .dll extension used like MP plugin configuration

SectionParam.Name: Online Screenshots
SectionParam.Description: Online stored screenshot urls separated by ;

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.

DependencyItem.Message: This version of DVDArt_Plugin requires MediaPortal 1.6.0 Beta or higher!

GeneralInfo.Name: DVDArt_Plugin
GeneralInfo.Author: m3rcury
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription: This plugin scans your MovingPictures, MyFilms, MyVideos, TVSeries and Music databases and downloads DVD Art, Clear Art, Clear Logo, CD Art, Banners, Actor, Writer and Director images from the fanart.tv and themoviedb.org websites where applicable.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
Added function to sort movie list either by title or by sortby field and serie list by pretty name or sort name.
Also fixed issue of looping bug when selecting new images for series.
